title: Go to gym
description: I improve my physical condition, increase my energy and reduce stress.

title: Travel
description: I learn about different cultures, meet new people and explore new places.

title: Listen to music
description: It helps me relax, improve my mood and focus.

title: Watch anime
description: It helps me improve my creativity and explore imaginative stories and worlds.

title: Play videogames
description: It helps me relax and have fun, in addition to improving my coordination and problem solving.
